title: Activist Kalpona Akter on Improving the Lives of Bangladeshi Garment Workers | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Activist Kalpona Akter on Improving the Lives of Bangladeshi Garment Workers | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Speaking at BoF VOICES, the founder of the Bangladesh Centre for Worker Solidarity outlines her campaign to establish fairer, safer working conditions across the garment industry.To watch Kalpona's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. Sign up for BoF’s Da
description:
Speaking at BoF VOICES, the founder of the Bangladesh Centre for Worker Solidarity outlines her campaign to establish fairer, safer working conditions across the garment industry.

To watch Kalpona's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
